column4: Hi I'm trying to access a Mac Journaled partition but ubuntu keeps spitting back that its read only. Ive tried chown root:root and chmod 777 over the drive and I still cant write to it. Any help?
You need to turn off journaling, open up disk utilities and turn off journaling
can I disable it in ubuntu? I cant disable from a mac and I couldnt find a disable option in disk utility
